attributes.action: Stop the introduction of parking charges for motorcycles within the UK by any local authority, city council or county council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With congestion charging, overcrowding on the public transport, increased public transport fares, reduced services on public transport and the reduced environmental impact of the motorcycle, it is unfair to charge for motorcycle parking anywhere in London.  It is just a money making scheme and nothing to do with a lack of sufficient bike parking.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the introduction of parking charges for motorcycles within the UK by any local authority, city council or county council."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14613.asp

Prime Minister's Office
